h2_title: Where to Find the Earth Wolf
content: Take the path to the right of the sealed gate, and fight past two Rat Captains while keeping the village shacks on your left. As you circle the area, you can find a pathway leading to an archway guarded by a Rat Archer and Rat Governor, and you'll find the boss inside.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Earth_Wolf.md', within the main section titled 'Earth Wolf', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Earth Wolf'.
The content is as follows:
Take the path to the right of the sealed gate, and fight past two Rat Captains while keeping the village shacks on your left. As you circle the area, you can find a pathway leading to an archway guarded by a Rat Archer and Rat Governor, and you'll find the boss inside.
